courtesy Jill Ravitch

Jill Ravitch defeats her recall efforts with over  of the votes being no. nick Vides and Lauren A PERIOD SpatesSeptember  

With approximately  of ballots counted Gov PERIOD Gavin Newsom will remain in Californias governors mansion according to the Associated Press PERIOD

Newsom beat the recall handily with nearly  of voters preferring he stay in office to finish his term PERIOD

In Sonoma County District Attorney Jill Ravitch also survived a recall PERIOD More than  of voters listened to her campaigns pleas to reject revenge and keep her as DA PERIOD

The campaign against her was financed solely by wealthy businessman Bill Gallaher who spent . million in an attempt to oust Ravitch after she brought charges against his nursing home business for failing to properly prepare for and evacuate residents during the  Tubbs Fire PERIOD Executives from Gallahers Oakmont of Varenna and Villa Capri facilities agreed to the terms of a settlement but Gallaher went after her regardless PERIOD

I hope when Gallaher looks in the mirror tonight hes ashamed at what he sees Ravitch said to her watch party at the Teamsters Local  in Santa Rosa PERIOD

This recall was about one angry man who was held accountable PERIOD I did my job my office did their job and he had a tantrum she said to cheers from her supporters PERIOD And fortunately Sonoma County saw through it and Im so honored so absolutely honored that the people in this community said We dont buy it. nicholas Nick Vides hehim is majoring in photojournalism PERIOD He is a seasoned breaking news reporter dedicated to making sure every shutter click..
